official.headline: System Refresh Underway
official.anchor_line: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, is receiving critical upgrades to support smooth city services.
official.contextual_reframing: Temporary modifications to automated governance are reinforcing Stenograd's infrastructure for continued public reliability.

official.headline: Citizen Access Ensured
official.anchor_line: All residents are assured uninterrupted access to daily essentials through adaptive civic channels.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd's data-driven management safeguards your routines, proving the value of responsive systems in times of adjustment.

official.headline: Transparent Monitoring Grows
official.anchor_line: New open reporting displays offer residents real-time updates on network conditions across the capital.
official.contextual_reframing: Visible oversight demonstrates the city's commitment to open information and system resilience for all.

underground.headline: BCI Breaks Down
underground.anchor_line: Stenograd's all-seeing BCI is failing and everyday life is grinding to a halt.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, once advertised as perfect, is stumbling. When the system scores everyone, nobody escapes the fallout when it goes dark.

underground.headline: Access Denied Again
underground.anchor_line: Residents face blocked doors and chaos while the system glitches and locks out the 'noncompliant.'
underground.contextual_reframing: When every digital move is tracked, a single low score means real lost access to food, jobs and care. People with nothing to hide are suddenly invisible.

underground.headline: Shadow Networks Rise
underground.anchor_line: Citizen-run networks takeover, letting people help each other as the city's tech crumbles.
underground.contextual_reframing: With the old BCI breaking, locals launch new, open scoring systems—challenging control and exposing what life was really like under the data regime.
